author: cms-btv-pog
body:
One main fix in the b-tag Validation sequence configuration to avoid double filling of some histograms.
Other fix: new CSVv2 tagger added in the validation sequence in replacement to the CSVMVA recently removed.
Other small changes in the cfg files examples to run the b-tag validation sequences on RECO and DQMIO files.
title: Fixes btag dqm72x
